name: Cargolux 747-8R7F [LX-VCC] Crosswind Overhead Landing at Calgary [HD]
description:
When I first discovered this new spot, I thought to myself: "I wonder what a Cargolux 747 would be like from this spot..." And now I know. Really quite a thrill to be so close to a 747-8 flying over, even if it's so quiet, too. It was also exciting because it came in extremely early, and it's very rare to see Cargolux in daylight. I hope you enjoy the video!

Thanks for watching, please comment, rate, and subscribe! More videos are coming soon.
_____________________________________________________

FLIGHT INFO
FlightAware: http://flightaware.com/live/flight/LXVCC
Aircraft registration: LX-VCC
Callsign: Cargolux 772 Heavy
Runway used: 34
